snippet.title: Fatal Fury Mark Of The Wolves - Sega Dreamcast
snippet.description:
Garou: Mark of the Wolves is a 1999 fighting game produced by SNK, originally for the Neo Geo system. It is the ninth and currently final installment of the Fatal Fury series.


#sega #dreamcast #retrogaming
